title: tOraNa pandalilE
sahitya:
tOraNa pandalilE pANDiyan tayal vizhiyil kalyANa vaibhavamAi


anupallavi

  pUraNamAgavE palavagai maNIhAram pudumalar malaiyuDan pun sirippuDan ninrAr


caraNam    mariyOdiDa nAnmukhanumamarndiDa irai paNi niraivanum sirippuDan vandiDa
tan tirai karattAle tirumagazhAl tozhumAlE tangaiyin malar karattai sundaraniDam vaittAn
				(madhyamakAla)
candanam kumkumam pADigaL vandu virundiDa cintai magizhndu
vindai vindai ena bhUtagaNam viyandu aru suvai uNavu uNDiDa 
kaNDirAda pala sIr vagai vandiDa eNNilAda navaratnam kuvindiDa
maNDala pugazhndiDa engum kANAda mAperum tirumAl madurai talam adanil
